mn131:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn131:2.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn131:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn131:4.2: ‘Evamrupo ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti, ‘evamvedano ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti, ‘evamsanno ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti, ‘evamsankharo ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti, ‘evamvinnano ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti—
mn131:5.2: ‘Evamrupo ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, ‘evamvedano ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, ‘evamsanno ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, ‘evamsankharo ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, ‘evamvinnano ahosim atitamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti—
mn131:6.2: ‘Evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim samanvaneti, evamvedano siyam …pe… evamsanno siyam … evamsankharo siyam … evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhananti tattha nandim samanvaneti—
mn131:7.2: ‘Evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti, evamvedano siyam … evamsanno siyam … evamsankharo siyam … ‘evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhanan’ti tattha nandim na samanvaneti—
mn131:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
mn131:8.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam;
mn131:8.7: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam—
mn131:8.8: evam kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn131:9.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati?
mn131:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito
mn131:9.3: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam;
mn131:9.7: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam—
mn131:9.8: evam kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn131:11.2: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
mn131:11.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
